video.title: そらのおとしもの
video.synopsis: Girl-crazy Tomoki's quiet life gets turned upside down when beautiful, winged Ikaros falls from the sky -- and starts calling him master.

episodes.synopsis: Tomoki's life is turned upside down when beautiful, winged Ikaros falls from the sky and offers to make his every wish come true.
episodes.title: A Full-Frontal Hero Arises in the World!

episodes.synopsis: With one of Ikaros' cards in his possession, Tomoki gets a glimpse of Sohara's panties. The card's power activates, and Sohara's panties fly away.
episodes.title: An Airborne Prismatic Panty Adventure

episodes.synopsis: Ikaros seems to lack basic computing skills, so Sugata urges Tomoki to assign the Angeloid various tasks to learn her strengths and weaknesses.
episodes.title: Angeloid Directive Zero

episodes.synopsis: After Sohara uses one of Ikaros' cards to make a wish, every time Tomoki looks at a pair of panties, the bloomers go boom!
episodes.title: Love and Triangles, Revisited

episodes.synopsis: While visiting Mikako, Tomoki ends up on the run from gangsters. He escapes but then finds himself on a deserted island -- and stalked by a monster!
episodes.title: Hot Night with the Big Fish

episodes.synopsis: After the surprising arrival of a new Angeloid named Nymph -- who seems to have a bit of an attitude -- the gang heads to the beach.
episodes.title: Swimsuit Surf Brigade, Go! Go! Go!

episodes.synopsis: Ikaros and Nymph make a splash when they enroll at Tomoki's school. Later, new questions arise when Nymph discovers a secret about Ikaros' past.
episodes.title: The Brainy, Heart-Pounding Transfer Students

episodes.synopsis: A festival turns into a cork gun shootout -- and there's a $100,000 prize for the last person standing.
episodes.title: For Whom the Shooting Festival Is Held

episodes.synopsis: To act more human, Ikaros starts lying to her friends. Meanwhile, Nymph turns Tomoki's life upside down by making him irresistible to women.
episodes.title: The Delusional Story That Began with a Lie

episodes.synopsis: It's a musical showdown at the Cultural Fair as Tomoki and the gang put together a band and take on the nearby private school's classical orchestra.
episodes.title: Where the Melodious Words of an Angel Go

episodes.synopsis: With Sugata's assistance (and one of Ikaros' cards), Tomoki devises the perfect disguise to sneak into the girls' bathing area: He morphs into a girl.
episodes.title: Off We Go to My Bathhouse Paradise

episodes.synopsis: Ikaros and Nymph just can't seem to crack a smile. After the Angeloids work on the problem together, they take Tomoki out for a three-way date.
episodes.title: Chains of No Escape

episodes.synopsis: After surprising Tomoki with a sudden farewell, Ikaros endures a treacherous encounter with Harpy and Gamma. Can Ikaros find a way to defeat them?
episodes.title: Queen of the Sky

episodes.synopsis: The gang heads to a water park, and Tomoki goes undercover to feast his eyes on as much flesh as he can. But after his plan fails, Nymph punishes him.
episodes.title: Project Pink

episodes.synopsis: The gang plays the "Dive Game" to explore their dreams after Tomoki's recent vision of the mysterious angel.
episodes.title: You Strip, Too! The Return of the Full-frontal Hero

episodes.synopsis: While Tomoki looks for a way to control his raging desire for all things Angeloid, the gang grows worried about a serious threat to Tomoki's life.
episodes.title: Bombshell! The Angel is a Big Boob

episodes.synopsis: At the fall festival, Tomoki adopts an alter ego to enter a wrestling tournament. Meanwhile, Nymph finds herself looking at Tomoki in unexpected ways.
episodes.title: A Proud-fought Battle

episodes.synopsis: The first snowfall of the season leads to a massive snowball fight! Tomoki leads the boys in battle against Mikako's girls.
episodes.title: Mortal Combat! Hot Spring Snowball Fight at 1.4° Below

episodes.synopsis: When visiting Tomoki's dream, Sugata learns more about Synapse, including a shocking fact about their relationship with humanity.
episodes.title: The Brother Who Came From Heaven

episodes.synopsis: After Tomoki learns that the girls at school find him undesirable and unintelligent, the gang takes part in a quiz to find out how smart they are.
episodes.title: Reach a Decision! The Up and Down of Heaven and Hell

episodes.synopsis: Even though they know it's a risky move, Astraea and Nymph decide to raid Ikaros's watermelon patch.
episodes.title: Eating Watermelon Tomoki

episodes.synopsis: The time has arrived for Astraea to make a choice. Will she do the Sky Master's bidding and destroy Ikaros and Nymph once and for all?
episodes.title: The Song of the Angels Echoes in the Sky

episodes.synopsis: During the Summer Festival, Mikako organizes a fishing contest at the swimming pool. There's only one way to win: reel in the curviest catch!
episodes.title: Shoot-out! Fishing At the Jumbo Carnival of Dreams

episodes.synopsis: Sohara teaches Ikaros about the ins and outs of marriage. Meanwhile, Tomoki puts the final touches on his summer project.
episodes.title: Peek Into the Fantasy Field

episodes.synopsis: Tomoki takes action when Ikaros, Nymph and Astraea are overpowered in battle by Chaos. After the fight ends, it looks like peaceful days are ahead.
episodes.title: The Edge of an Indiscriminate Requiem

episodes.synopsis: Tomoki makes a splash with the girls in swim class when he transforms into pool water. Later, the whole gang heads to a wedding.
episodes.title: Forte Wings Soaring for Tomorrow
